entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
